org.x2d.zuul
Class Character

java.lang.Object
  org.x2d.zuul.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Beggar, Cat, Priest, TempleGuard
public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Character class. Stores information about one NPC in the world. Subclasses should override methodes when needed to create new functionality for a NPC. Here comes and example of how it can be used: 

public class MyCharacter extends Character {
    public MyCharacter() {
        super("my char name", "something the character says");
    }
    @Override
    public void talk(Game g, Player p) {
        //Something that should happen when the player talks to this
        //character.
    }
}
